summary.span: 繪製一系列連接的直線。

span.span: Draws a series of connected straight lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個物件是類似於物件時，不同之處在於此物件不需要是已關閉 」 圖形。This object is similar to the object, except that this object does not need to be a closed shape. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立項目並設定其屬性，使用程式碼。The following example shows how to create a element and set its properties by using code. [!code-cpp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/CPP/ShapesProcedural.cpp#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-csharp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/Csharp/ShapesProcedural.cs#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-vb[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/VisualBasic/ShapesProceduralVB.vb#shapesproceduralpolyline)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 列舉型別 (Enumeration)，這個列舉型別指定圖案的內部填滿規則。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration that specifies how the interior fill of the shape is determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值會決定 「 「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。The enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape. 它從點朝任意方向繪製光線，然後計算從指定的形狀與光線相交的路徑片段的數目。It draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and counts the number of path segments from the specified shape that the ray crosses. 如果數值為奇數，則點即; 內如果是偶數，則點即外。If the number is odd, the point is inside; if it is even, the point is outside. 列舉值會決定 「 「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。The enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape. 它第一次從點朝任何方向繪製光線，，然後檢查圖案線段與光線相交的地方。It first draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and then examines the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. 它是以計數為零，開頭新增每個每當有區段從左到右與光線和減去每個時間的路徑區段光線由右至左。It starts with a count of zero, adding one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtracting one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. 計算交會後，如果結果為零後，該點即在路徑外。After it counts the crossings, if the result is zero, the point is outside the path. 否則就在路徑內。Otherwise, it is inside. ![填滿規則圖例](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填滿規則圖例")![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule 範例FillRule Example ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 取得或設定包含 頂點的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection that contains the vertex points of the .

value.span: 描述 頂點之 結構的集合。

span.span: A collection of structures that describe the vertex points of the .

value.span: 預設值是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中)。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用以空格分隔的清單，以逗號分隔的 x 座標和 y 座標組來設定這個屬性。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], use a space-delimited list of comma-separated x- coordinate and y-coordinate pairs to set this attribute. 使用簡單標記法，也就是`x1,y1 x2,y2 ... xn,yn`。Use simple notation, that is, `x1,y1 x2,y2 ... xn,yn`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立項目並設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example shows how to create a element and set the property by using code. [!code-cpp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/CPP/ShapesProcedural.cpp#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-csharp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/Csharp/ShapesProcedural.cs#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-vb[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/VisualBasic/ShapesProceduralVB.vb#shapesproceduralpolyline)]
